model_card.name: xAI: Grok Code Fast 1
model_card.description: Grok Code Fast 1 is a speedy and economical reasoning model that excels at agentic coding. With reasoning traces visible in the response, developers can steer Grok Code for high-quality work flows.

request.prompt: In a single HTML file named index.html, create a cool raining and thunder animation. No controls no interactiveness.
